name: Amethyst Cluster
description: Beautiful purple amethyst cluster with natural formations and raw edges. Known for its calming and protective properties.

name: Clear Quartz Point
description: Pure clear quartz crystal point with excellent clarity. Believed to amplify energy and intention.

name: Rose Quartz Heart
description: Polished rose quartz carved into a heart shape. Associated with love, compassion, and emotional healing.

name: Black Tourmaline Raw
description: Raw black tourmaline specimen with natural terminations. Known for grounding and protection against negative energy.

name: Citrine Geode
description: Golden yellow citrine geode with sparkling interior. Associated with abundance, prosperity, and positive energy.

name: Labradorite Palm Stone
description: Smooth polished labradorite stone perfect for palm meditation. Features beautiful iridescent flash effects.

name: Selenite Wand
description: Translucent selenite crystal wand. Used for cleansing, clarity, and spiritual alignment.

name: Aventurine Tower
description: Green aventurine polished into a tower shape. Associated with luck, opportunity, and prosperity.
